channel.title: Help me! how can i give someone unlimited hp?
channel.description: how can i give someone unlimited hp? please help me :S

item.title: Help me! how can i give someone unlimited hp?
item.dc:creator: @Breaking_Shadow Breaking_Shadow
item.description:
@Breaking_Shadow wrote:

simple, go to a character file, then press on the notepad of the user you want to edit. On skill section go to skill 3 and put 99999 or whatever. Then that character should not eat or whatever that heals there HP or it will turn back to normal.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me! how can i give someone unlimited hp?

item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

Here is a base oyu can use for unlimitedhp

if(playerRights >= 3){if(IsDead) IsDead = false;NewHP = playerLevel[3];}
